name: Boon Technologies Pvt Ltd
overview: Boon Technologies Pvt Ltd.was founded by industry experts bringing together, wealth of experience in varied domains allied as BMS (Building Management System). This includes Time Attendance based Access Control Systems, CCTV Surveillance System, Remote Monitoring of Cameras, Electronic Time Attendance Recorders based on RFID technology and Biometrics (Fingerprint Identification), Intrusion Alarm Systems, Needle Detection System, Vehicle Tracking System , Fire Alarm/ Fire Detection Systems, Mobile Jammers. As our tag line says “Security Excellence Re-invented”, we always envision the innovation to provide the unmatched quality and after sales service to our Clients.
